title: Star In My Mind
overview: Star in My Mind portrays a romantic story of a secret admirer who spends his life by the quote "No matter which direction the earth rotates, the North Star will always shine at the same spot." Time passes, people come and go, but his love will be with the very same person, always.Â Daonueaonce again whirls up to meet with Khabkluen, his "first love," and the classmate he confessed to before traveling to study in Germany. However, "Have a safe flight" was the only thing he got in return for the tough confession he finally had the courage to make. Even so, this reunion makes "Daonuea" realize that no matter how much time passes, the North Star will always remain where it is.Root for this secret admirer whose mind can never be changed by the amount of time or people who enter his life. He, comparable to the North Star which always remains at the same spot, is waiting for someone to open up his heart...and let the star lead the way.
